conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
swimming contains tables such as swimmer.
Table swimmer has columns such as id, name, nationality, meter_100, meter_200, meter_300, meter_400, meter_500, meter_600, meter_700, time.
conversations.query: List countries that have more than one swimmer.
conversations.answer: select nationality , count(*) from swimmer group by nationality having count(*) > 1;
